Title: All Good Things... (1)
Plot: (Part 1 of 2) Five years have passed and everyone is reunited in Capeside for a special wedding. Dawson has been living in Los Angeles producing his autobiographical television series 'The Creek' but has never forgotten the love of his life, Joey is a successful book editor living in New York with her boyfriend but comes home to realize she still loves her childhood sweethearts, Pacey is the owner of the new Ice House and still carries a torch for Joey, Jen is a single mom living with Grams and
GuestStars: Sam Doumit, Virginia Madsen, Kyle Searles, Jeremy Sisto, Ashleigh Sumner, Steven Roten, Jason Davis, Elizabeth Roberts, Corey Jackson, Robert Pralgo, David Jenkins, Kristen Solt, Mark Joy, MIchael Hartson, Logan R
